author: Vertyco
description: Chat GPT assistant(or chat) cog with configurable prompt injection
end_user_data_statement: This cog doesn't store data about users, however it does store prompts and OpenAI API keys on a per server basis
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Assistant! type `[p]assistant` to see all commands.
You will need an api key **Per Server** for this cog. https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys
